scripts.init:env: test -f server/.env || cp server/.env.example server/.env && test -f runner/.env || cp runner/.env.example runner/.env && test -f ui/.env.local || cp ui/.env.example ui/.env.local
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run bootstrap && npm run init:env
scripts.bootstrap: npm --prefix server install && npm --prefix runner install && npm --prefix ui install
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n server,runner,ui -c blue,magenta,green "npm --prefix server run dev" "npm --prefix runner run dev" "npm --prefix ui run dev"
scripts.build: npm --prefix server run build && npm --prefix runner run build && npm --prefix ui run build
scripts.start: concurrently -k -n server,runner,ui -c blue,magenta,green "npm --prefix server start" "npm --prefix runner start" "npm --prefix ui start"
scripts.smoke: npm --prefix server run smoke && npm --prefix runner run smoke && npm --prefix ui run smoke
